attributes.action: scrap the current National Anthem and explore possibilities for a replacement which (a) doesn't segregate and alienate in terms of faith and (b) is about the nation not just one person.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
GOD SAVE THE QUEEN is not a National Anthem - even if it has been used for that purpose.

It divides the nation due to its references to "God" and alienates and excludes those of other religions, or of no religion, who do not follow the Christian faith, from genuinely singing it.

It is not about a nation, nor supporting a nation, it is about a monarch.

We need a genuinely National Anthem that unites us rather than a song which, by its very nature, divides. 

I suggest a feasibility study is put into place to explore the possibilities of a nationwide competition to write an appropriate new National Anthem which could include suggestions of existing songs as well as newly composed ones.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
